conclusion: Plan to analyze the image to understand the flow path of the liquid through the baffles.
The image shows containers A, B, C, D, E, and F with colored lines representing baffles connecting these containers.
Liquid will flow out from containers A, B, C, and D.
Container A is connected to container E through a baffle.
Container B is connected to container E through a baffle.
Container C is connected to container F through a baffle.
Container D is connected to container F through a baffle.
Liquid from containers A and B will flow into container E.
Liquid from containers C and D will flow into container F.
Liquid will flow into container E from A and B, and into container F from C and D.
